name: Santa & Presents
description:
Santa & Presents is a Christmas-themed version of "Mario & Yoshi" by Nintendo from 1991.

Objects are falling from the top of the screen and you can collect them on four different stacks. Form a pair of two same objects to gain points. Or combine a top-half with a bottom-half of a present-box to gain a bunch of points at once. The more objects are between the box-halfs the more points you get.

This game is still in early development. Currently, there is only an endless-mode with simple paint-graphics. Updates will follow shortly!
